mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CONVERT(INT,CODE) DESC) NUM, PORTFOLIO.* FROM PORTFOLIO WHERE ${field} LIKE '%${query}%') P WHERE P.NUM BETWEEN 1+(${page}-1)*9 AND ${page}*9
mapper.insert:
SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CONVERT(INT,CODE)),0) + 1 FROM PORTFOLIO
INSERT INTO PORTFOLIO (CODE,WRITER,TITLE,STATE,PROJECTENDDATE,LIKEHIT,PUBLICCHECK) VALUES(#{code},#{writer},#{title},#{state},#{projectEndDate},0,#{publicCheck})
mapper.update: UPDATE PORTFOLIO SET TITLE=#{title}, STATE=#{state}, PROJECTENDDATE=#{projectEndDate}, PUBLICCHECK=#{publicCheck}, REGDATE=getDate() WHERE CODE=#{code}
